diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $KL$ is $4x$ units.
The length of the line $KJ$ is $3x + 6$ units.
The length of the line $JL$ is $5x - 6$ units.
The length of line $KJ$ is equal to the length of line $KL$.
The length of line $KL$ is equal to the length of line $JL$.
line_instances: There are lines $KJ$, $KL$, and $JL$ forming a triangle $KJL$.
